steps.text: At your office desk, when you hear the mail chime.
Take a sip of water from your water bottle.
Open your new mail.
Quickly scan your mail for 10 seconds, just enough to know what it is about.
Label your mail within its right category. Urgent, Next, Delegate or Avoid.
Comeback to the task you were doing.
During the day, anywhere in town.
When you open any kind of door.
Stand up right. Put your back straight and Put your shoulder back.
Take a deep breath and say to yourself : “I got this”.
Label your mail within its right category. Urgent, Next, Delegate or Avoid.
Carry on to where you’re headed.

cards.title: todo thought, write to mini agenda

steps.text: During the day, anywhere in town.
When you open any kind of door.
Stand up right. Put your back straight and Put your shoulder back.
Take a deep breath and say to yourself : “I got this”.
Label your mail within its right category. Urgent, Next, Delegate or Avoid.
Carry on to where you’re headed.
In the morning, when you enter your office for the first time.
Open the windows.
Fill up your desk’s water bottle.
Take 5 minutes to write down everything you have in your mind about work, tasks and event in your mini paper agenda.
Review all events, tasks and meetings planned for today.
Put your mini paper agenda in your jacket's left pocket.
Fire up your PC and start working on your first planned task right away.
In the office, before the start of a meeting, when waiting for other participant to arrive.
Open the windows.
Ready up your paper notebook and pencil on the table.
Write down any questions that come to your mind..
Prepare Fruits and water bottles for all participants.
Do 10 trunks extension.
Review your mini paper agenda.
If you still have time, review your daily mantra.
